comments:
NullPointerException when loading test sites.

Using the attached workspace with the TPTP-4.4.0-200705080100Y driver and IBM JRE 1.5 SR4a, the following exception is thrown when loading a couple of the test suites (see error label and icon in the Test Navigator of the attached screen capture:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.DefaultTestCaseProxyNode.<init>(DefaultTestCaseProxyNode.java:52)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.navigator.DefaultTypedElementProxyFactory.recreate(DefaultTypedElementProxyFactory.java:42)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.navigator.DefaultTestSuiteProxyNode.<init>(DefaultTestSuiteProxyNode.java:95)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.navigator.DefaultTypedElementProxyFactory.recreate(DefaultTypedElementProxyFactory.java:40)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.navigator.HyadesProxyNodeFactory.recreate(HyadesProxyNodeFactory.java:186)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.EMFResourceProxyFactory.recreate(EMFResourceProxyFactory.java:127)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.FileProxyMarkerPersister.buildProxyFromSavedState(FileProxyMarkerPersister.java:102)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.FileProxyMarkerPersister.loadProxy(FileProxyMarkerPersister.java:77)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.FileProxyNodeCache.loadProxy(FileProxyNodeCache.java:231)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.FileProxyNodeCache.getProxy(FileProxyNodeCache.java:213)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.FileProxyManager.getProxy(FileProxyManager.java:64)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.async.FileProxiesRequest.computeProxy(FileProxiesRequest.java:59)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.async.ProxiesRequest._computeProxy(ProxiesRequest.java:151)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.internal.navigator.proxy.async.ProxiesRequest.run(ProxiesRequest.java:132)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

The test suite opens and run successfully.
Seems to only happen when the editor(s) are closed.

Since this defect can not be consistently reproduced and the test suites are still functional, deferring to 4.5.

Jerome, please provide a sizing when 4.4 is fished.
